ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.description: [Champion] slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

ability.name: Orb of Deception
ability.description: [Champion] sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.

ability.name: Shuriken Flip
ability.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

Akshan.name: Akshan
Akshan.title: the Rogue Sentinel
Akshan.quote: "Fixing the world, one scoundrel at a time!"

ability.name: Heroic Swing
ability.description: [Champion] fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy while swinging. He can jump off early or gets knocked off when colliding with champions or terrain.

ability.name: Pulverize
ability.description: [Champion] smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

ability.name: Lacerate
ability.description: [Champion] whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash.

ability.name: Tantrum
ability.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage [Champion] would take. [Champion] can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time [Champion] is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced.

ability.name: Glacial Storm
ability.description: [Champion] summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.

Annie.name: Annie
Annie.title: the Dark Child
Annie.quote: "You wanna play too? It'll be fun!"

ability.name: Summon: Tibbers
ability.description: [Champion] wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

ability.name: Weapon Abilites
ability.description: [Champion] has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon:Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack.Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons.Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon.Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon.Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

ability.name: Hawkshot
ability.description: [Champion] sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

Aurelion Sol.name: Aurelion Sol
Aurelion Sol.title: The Star Forger
Aurelion Sol.quote: "In a constantly shifting cosmos, a world this static is... refreshing."

ability.name: Falling Star / The Skies Descend
ability.description: Falling Star: [Champion] crashes a star into the earth. This impact deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits. Gathering enough Stardust transforms [Champion]'s next Falling Star into The Skies Descend.The Skies Descend: [Champion] drags a giant star down from the heavens with an increased impact zone and increased damage, knocking up enemies rather than stunning them. A shockwave then spreads from the edge of the impact zone, which damages and slows the enemies it hits. Stardust increases the impact area of both Falling Star and The Skies Descend.

ability.name: Twofold Hex
ability.description: [Champion] sends out a missile that curses any enemies it hits. She can then recast the ability to draw active curses back toward herself, damaging foes who are hit along the way.

ability.name: Emperor's Divide
ability.description: [Champion] summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.title: the Wandering Caretaker
Bard.quote: Bard lets a  Meep onto his shoulder and lets it run to and fro across his arms.

ability.name: Tempered Fate
ability.description: [Champion] sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

Bel'Veth.name: Bel'Veth
Bel'Veth.title: the Empress of the Void
Bel'Veth.quote: "I am the voice of the silence."

ability.name: Void Surge
ability.description: [Champion] dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.

ability.name: Rocket Grab
ability.description: [Champion] fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.

Brand.name: Brand
Brand.title: the Burning Vengeance
Brand.quote: "Ready to set the world on fire? Heheheh..."

ability.name: Pyroclasm
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of [Champion] and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

ability.name: Glacial Fissure
ability.description: [Champion] slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

Briar.name: Briar
Briar.title: the Restrained Hunger
Briar.quote: "Nice to meet you! I'm hungry. I mean... Briar!"

ability.name: Head Rush
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their Armor.

Caitlyn.name: Caitlyn
Caitlyn.title: the Sheriff of Piltover
Caitlyn.quote: "Shall I turn in my badge and rifle as well?"

ability.name: Piltover Peacemaker
ability.description: [Champion] revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

Camille.name: Camille
Camille.title: the Steel Shadow
Camille.quote: "Precision is the difference between a butcher and a surgeon."

ability.name: Precision Protocol
ability.description: [Champion]'s next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if [Champion] delays a period of time between the two attacks.

ability.name: Noxious Blast
ability.description: [Champion] blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

Cho'Gath.name: Cho'Gath
Cho'Gath.title: the Terror of the Void
Cho'Gath.quote: "You'd wish the world you know to end! Yeeeesssss..."

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.

Corki.name: Corki
Corki.title: the Daring Bombardier
Corki.quote: "I'm up to snuff, and gots me an ace machine!"

ability.name: Phosphorus Bomb
ability.description: [Champion] fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.

ability.name: Apprehend
ability.description: [Champion] hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, [Champion] sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

ability.name: Lunar Rush
ability.description: Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing magic damage.Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

ability.name: Blood Rush
ability.description: [Champion] gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

ability.name: Heart Zapper
ability.description: [Champion] electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, [Champion] deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.

Ekko.name: Ekko
Ekko.title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
Ekko.quote: "It's not how much time you have, it's how you use it."

ability.name: Parallel Convergence
ability.description: [Champion]'s basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to low health enemies. He can cast Parallel Convergence to split the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If [Champion] enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and stuns enemies by suspending them in time.

Elise.name: Elise
Elise.title: the Spider Queen
Elise.quote: "Only the spider is safe in her web."

ability.name: Spider Form
ability.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.

ability.name: Whiplash
ability.description: [Champion] whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains Move Speed for a short duration.

ability.name: Arcane Shift
ability.description: [Champion] teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

Fiddlesticks.name: Fiddlesticks
Fiddlesticks.title: the Ancient Fear
Fiddlesticks.quote: A stripped-down version of Star Guardian 2022's orchestral theme plays.

ability.name: Reap
ability.description: [Champion] slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.

ability.name: Riposte
ability.description: [Champion] parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if [Champion] blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.

ability.name: Urchin Strike
ability.description: [Champion] dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.

ability.name: Hero's Entrance
ability.description: [Champion] designates an ally's position as his landing spot, granting all allies in the area a magic shield. After a delay [Champion] smashes down location, knocking up nearby enemies.

Gangplank.name: Gangplank
Gangplank.title: the Saltwater Scourge
Gangplank.quote: "Neither the flames nor the depths could claim me."

ability.name: Parrrley
ability.description: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

Garen.name: Garen
Garen.title: The Might of Demacia
Garen.quote: "My heart and sword always for Demacia."

ability.name: Courage
ability.description: [Champion] passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a shield and tenacity for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.

Gnar.name: Gnar
Gnar.title: the Missing Link
Gnar.quote: Gnar drops upside down and playfully flaunts the skull he carries around.

ability.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
ability.description: [Champion] throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.Mega [Champion] instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.

ability.name: Barrel Roll
ability.description: [Champion] rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. The potency of the explosion increases over time. Enemies struck by the blast have their Move Speed slowed.

ability.name: Quickdraw
ability.description: [Champion] dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If [Champion] dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.

ability.name: Hallowed Mist
ability.description: [Champion] summons mist that protects her from enemies outside of it. She can only be targeted by enemies who enter the mist.

Hecarim.name: Hecarim
Hecarim.title: the Shadow of War
Hecarim.quote: "Behold, the might of the Shadow Isles."

ability.name: Onslaught of Shadows
ability.description: [Champion] summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. [Champion] creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

ability.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
ability.description: [Champion] lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.

Hwei.name: Hwei
Hwei.title: the Visionary
Hwei.quote: "A painter meets their subject eye to eye."

ability.name: Subject: Serenity
ability.description: [Champion] envisions a series of serenities, allowing him to paint invigorating settings.This ability replaces [Champion]'s abilities with utility abilities: Fleeting Current, Pool of Reflection, and Stirring Lights.

Illaoi.name: Illaoi
Illaoi.title: the Kraken Priestess
Illaoi.quote: "I'm not big on sermonsâ€”broken bones teach better lessons."

ability.name: Harsh Lesson
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

ability.name: Bladesurge
ability.description: [Champion] dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

ability.name: Triggerseed
ability.description: [Champion] places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies. The shield refreshes if it hits no enemies.

ability.name: Eye Of The Storm
ability.description: [Champion] conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.

Jarvan IV.name: Jarvan IV
Jarvan IV.title: the Exemplar of Demacia
Jarvan IV.quote: "By my will, this shall be finished."

ability.name: Golden Aegis
ability.description: [Champion] calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

Jax.name: Jax
Jax.title: Grandmaster at Arms
Jax.quote: Jax yawns. "Looks like I'll be carrying more than my own weight today."

ability.name: Counter Strike
ability.description: [Champion]'s combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

ability.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
ability.description: Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

Jhin.name: Jhin
Jhin.title: the Virtuoso
Jhin.quote: "In carnage, I bloom, like a flower in the dawn."

ability.name: Curtain Call
ability.description: [Champion] channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

Jinx.name: Jinx
Jinx.title: the Loose Cannon
Jinx.quote: "Rules are made to be broken... like buildings! Or people!"

ability.name: Flame Chompers!
ability.description: [Champion] throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

Kai'Sa.name: Kai'Sa
Kai'Sa.title: Daughter of the Void
Kai'Sa.quote: "Are you the hunter... or the prey?"

ability.name: Killer Instinct
ability.description: [Champion] dashes near an enemy champion.

ability.name: Sentinel
ability.description: Gain bonus damage when [Champion] and her Oathsworn strike the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

ability.name: Inner Flame
ability.description: [Champion] sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

Karthus.name: Karthus
Karthus.title: the Deathsinger
Karthus.quote: "Agony, ecstasy, peace. Every passing has a beauty all its own."

ability.name: Lay Waste
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.

Kassadin.name: Kassadin
Kassadin.title: the Void Walker
Kassadin.quote: "The balance of power must be preserved."

ability.name: Riftwalk
ability.description: [Champion] teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

ability.name: Bouncing Blade
ability.description: [Champion] throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

ability.name: Radiant Blast
ability.description: [Champion] conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

ability.name: Reaping Slash
ability.description: [Champion] dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

ability.name: Thundering Shuriken
ability.description: [Champion] throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

ability.name: Leap
ability.description: [Champion] leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

ability.name: Mounting Dread
ability.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

Kled.name: Kled
Kled.title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
Kled.quote: "I find courage unpredictable. It's total insanity you can rely on!"

ability.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
ability.description: [Champion] throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward [Champion].When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back [Champion] and restores courage.

ability.name: Void Ooze
ability.description: [Champion] launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

K'Sante.name: K'Sante
K'Sante.title: the Pride of Nazumah
K'Sante.quote: "Better to fight, than to live in fear."

ability.name: All Out
ability.description: [Champion] knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, [Champion] goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.

LeBlanc.name: LeBlanc
LeBlanc.title: the Deceiver
LeBlanc.quote: "The Black Rose shall bloom once more."

ability.name: Mimic
ability.description: [Champion] casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

ability.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
ability.description: Safeguard: [Champion] rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, [Champion] can cast Iron Will.Iron Will: [Champion]'s intense training allows him to thrive in battle. [Champion] gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

ability.name: Shield of Daybreak
ability.description: [Champion] uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.

ability.name: Blooming Blows
ability.description: Passively, [Champion] gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

Lissandra.name: Lissandra
Lissandra.title: the Ice Witch
Lissandra.quote: "I will bury the world in ice."

ability.name: Ring of Frost
ability.description: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.

Lucian.name: Lucian
Lucian.title: the Purifier
Lucian.quote: "Everybody dies. Some just need a little help."

ability.name: Piercing Light
ability.description: [Champion] shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

ability.name: Wild Growth
ability.description: [Champion] enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

Lux.name: Lux
Lux.title: the Lady of Luminosity
Lux.quote: "But all my light puns would've brightened your day."

ability.name: Prismatic Barrier
ability.description: [Champion] throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

Malphite.name: Malphite
Malphite.title: Shard of the Monolith
Malphite.quote: "I'm moving as fast as I can."

ability.name: Thunderclap
ability.description: [Champion] attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

ability.name: Nether Grasp
ability.description: [Champion] channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

ability.name: Bramble Smash
ability.description: [Champion] knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

ability.name: Wuju Style
ability.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.

Milio.name: Milio
Milio.title: The Gentle Flame
Milio.quote: "Stick with me! I'll keep you warm." Fuemigo cheers.

ability.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick
ability.description: Kick a ball that knocks back an enemy. The ball launches upward on hit and falls toward the enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in the area upon impact.

ability.name: Bullet Time
ability.description: [Champion] channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

ability.name: Warrior Trickster
ability.description: [Champion] becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.

ability.name: Obliterate
ability.description: [Champion] smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

Morgana.name: Morgana
Morgana.title: the Fallen
Morgana.quote: "I am bound, but I will not break."

ability.name: Black Shield
ability.description: [Champion] anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

Naafiri.name: Naafiri
Naafiri.title: the Hound of a Hundred Bites

ability.name: Eviscerate
ability.description: [Champion] dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.

Nami.name: Nami
Nami.title: the Tidecaller
Nami.quote: "I decide what the tide will bring."

ability.name: Aqua Prison
ability.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

Nasus.name: Nasus
Nasus.title: the Curator of the Sands
Nasus.quote: "The cycle of life and death continues,we will live,they will die."

ability.name: Fury of the Sands
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

ability.name: Titan's Wrath
ability.description: [Champion] gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.

ability.name: Tangle-Barbs
ability.description: [Champion] slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

ability.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
ability.description: In human form, [Champion] throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

ability.name: Slipstream
ability.description: [Champion] enthusiastically dashes toward her target, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through on the way.

ability.name: Duskbringer
ability.description: [Champion] throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, [Champion] can move through units and has increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.

ability.name: Absolute Zero
ability.description: [Champion] create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

ability.name: Ragnarok
ability.description: [Champion] passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking.

Orianna.name: Orianna
Orianna.title: the Lady of Clockwork
Orianna.quote: "We will kill your enemies. That will be fun."

ability.name: Command: Attack
ability.description: [Champion] commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

Ornn.name: Ornn
Ornn.title: The Fire below the Mountain
Ornn.quote: "I have fur. It is soft. Do not hug me."

ability.name: Bellows Breath
ability.description: [Champion] advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

ability.name: Comet Spear
ability.description: [Champion] either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

Poppy.name: Poppy
Poppy.title: Keeper of the Hammer
Poppy.quote: "I'm no heroâ€”just a Yordle with a hammer."

ability.name: Steadfast Presence
ability.description: [Champion] passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. [Champion] can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.

ability.name: Ghostwater Dive
ability.description: [Champion] enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.

ability.name: Audacity
ability.description: [Champion] dashes to an enemy, damaging them.

ability.name: Behind Enemy Lines
ability.description: [Champion] and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.

ability.name: Grand Entrance
ability.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

Rammus.name: Rammus
Rammus.title: the Armordillo
Rammus.quote: The voice-over for  Durian Defender Rammus is not available as unique set of audio files (the audio is directly pitched in-game from the base voice-over by the audio engine).

ability.name: Defensive Ball Curl
ability.description: [Champion] goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him.

ability.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
ability.description: [Champion] bites her target, dealing bonus damage if she has max Fury.While Burrowed, [Champion] creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

Rell.name: Rell
Rell.title: the Iron Maiden
Rell.quote: "Nothing gets in, no one gets out."

ability.name: Full Tilt
ability.description: Passive: [Champion] gains out of combat Move Speed.Active: [Champion] and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.

Renata Glasc.name: Renata Glasc
Renata Glasc.title: the Chem-Baroness
Renata Glasc.quote: "It's 'Miss Glasc'... if you value your life."

ability.name: Hostile Takeover
ability.description: Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.

ability.name: Cull the Meek
ability.description: [Champion] swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

ability.name: Savagery
ability.description: [Champion]'s next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

ability.name: Ki Burst
ability.description: [Champion] emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

ability.name: Scrap Shield
ability.description: [Champion] pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

ability.name: Realm Warp
ability.description: Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.On cast, [Champion] creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

ability.name: Wild Rush
ability.description: [Champion] dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.

ability.name: Glacial Prison
ability.description: [Champion] throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

Senna.name: Senna
Senna.title: the Redeemer
Senna.quote: "No one fights alone in the Mist."

ability.name: Curse of the Black Mist
ability.description: [Champion] draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased Move Speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities.

ability.name: High Note
ability.description: [Champion] deals damage in an area.

Sett.name: Sett
Sett.title: the Boss
Sett.quote: "'Ey, never pick a fight you can't win."

ability.name: Knuckle Down
ability.description: [Champion]'s next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. [Champion] also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.

ability.name: Two-Shiv Poison
ability.description: [Champion]'s Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health.

ability.name: Twilight Assault
ability.description: [Champion] recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from [Champion].

ability.name: Dragon's Descent
ability.description: [Champion] transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.[Champion] passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

ability.name: Insanity Potion
ability.description: [Champion] drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.

ability.name: Soul Furnace
ability.description: [Champion] shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When [Champion] kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.

Sivir.name: Sivir
Sivir.title: the Battle Mistress
Sivir.quote: "I always take my toll; blood, or gold."

ability.name: On The Hunt
ability.description: [Champion] leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addition, [Champion]'s attacks reduce her spell cooldowns.

Skarner.name: Skarner
Skarner.title: the Primordial Sovereign
Skarner.quote: "I am the vanguard of Ixtal's protection."

ability.name: Impale
ability.description: [Champion]'s tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by [Champion] as he moves around.

Smolder.name: Smolder
Smolder.title: the Fiery Fledgling
Smolder.quote: "I heard that the royal family of Camaroar used to offer rings to my ancestors. Ha, those things must've been humongous."

ability.name: Achooo!
ability.description: [Champion] lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.

ability.name: Aria of Perseverance
ability.description: [Champion] plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing [Champion] and a nearby wounded ally. [Champion] gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

ability.name: Wish
ability.description: [Champion] fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.

ability.name: Death's Hand
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

ability.name: Abscond / Abduct
ability.description: [Champion] dashes to a location. [Champion] can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.

ability.name: Force of Will
ability.description: [Champion] picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies.

Tahm Kench.name: Tahm Kench
Tahm Kench.title: The River King
Tahm Kench.quote: "Call me king, call me demon. Water forgets the names of the drowned."

ability.name: Tongue Lash
ability.description: [Champion] lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion.Applies a stack of  An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.

ability.name: Weaver's Wall
ability.description: [Champion] creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

ability.name: Assassin's Path
ability.description: [Champion] vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

Taric.name: Taric
Taric.title: the Shield of Valoran
Taric.quote: "That glimmer of hope you see, that's me."

ability.name: Starlight's Touch
ability.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

ability.name: Noxious Trap
ability.description: [Champion] throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If [Champion] throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

ability.name: Flay
ability.description: [Champion]'s attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, [Champion] sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

Tristana.name: Tristana
Tristana.title: the Yordle Gunner
Tristana.quote: "Once a Bandle gunner, always a Bandle gunner!"

ability.name: Rocket Jump
ability.description: [Champion] fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

Trundle.name: Trundle
Trundle.title: the Troll King
Trundle.quote: "I'm troll judge, troll jury, and execu... troll!"

ability.name: Chomp
ability.description: [Champion] bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

ability.name: Spinning Slash
ability.description: [Champion] slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

ability.name: Wild Cards
ability.description: [Champion] throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

Twitch.name: Twitch
Twitch.title: the Plague Rat
Twitch.quote: "What doesn't kill you just isn't finished yet."

ability.name: Contaminate
ability.description: [Champion] wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

ability.name: Blazing Stampede
ability.description: [Champion] gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.

Urgot.name: Urgot
Urgot.title: the Dreadnought
Urgot.quote: "You cannot know strength... Until you are broken."

ability.name: Purge
ability.description: [Champion] slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions [Champion] has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

ability.name: Blighted Quiver
ability.description: Passive: [Champion]' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. [Champion]' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: [Champion] empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

Vayne.name: Vayne
Vayne.title: the Night Hunter
Vayne.quote: "Let us hunt those who have fallen to darkness."

ability.name: Condemn
ability.description: [Champion] draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

ability.name: Baleful Strike
ability.description: [Champion] unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant [Champion] some ability power permanently.

ability.name: Tectonic Disruption
ability.description: [Champion] causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

ability.name: Personal Space
ability.description: Gain a shield and damage nearby enemies.

ability.name: Cease and Desist
ability.description: [Champion] runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

ability.name: Blade of the Ruined King
ability.description: [Champion]'s spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health.[Champion] can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.

ability.name: Death Ray
ability.description: [Champion] uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Tides of Blood
ability.description: [Champion] pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

ability.name: Frenzied Maul
ability.description: [Champion] damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals [Champion].

ability.name: Blood Hunt
ability.description: [Champion] senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

Xayah.name: Xayah
Xayah.title: the Rebel
Xayah.quote: "I can never resist an invitation to dance."

ability.name: Bladecaller
ability.description: [Champion] calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

ability.name: Shocking Orb
ability.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

ability.name: Crescent Guard
ability.description: [Champion] challenges an enemy he damaged recently. [Champion] deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

Yasuo.name: Yasuo
Yasuo.title: the Unforgiven
Yasuo.quote: "Death is like the windâ€”always by my side."

ability.name: Steel Tempest
ability.description: Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.

ability.name: Mortal Steel
ability.description: Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Mortal Steel dashes [Champion] forward with a gust of wind knocking enemies Airborne.Mortal Steel is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.

Yorick.name: Yorick
Yorick.title: Shepherd of Souls
Yorick.quote: "Fear not... I will make use of your corpse."

ability.name: Eulogy of the Isles
ability.description: [Champion] summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes [Champion]'s attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.

ability.name: Final Chapter
ability.description: [Champion] channels five waves that damage enemies and heal allies. [Champion] can move, attach, and cast Zoomies! while channeling. While on her Best Friend, this spell also follows her mouse.

ability.name: Elastic Slingshot
ability.description: [Champion] attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

ability.name: Razor Shuriken
ability.description: [Champion] and his shadows throw their shurikens.Each shuriken deals damage to every enemy hit.

ability.name: Burst Fire
ability.description: Burst Fire shoots a burst of 7 rounds that deal attack damage to the first enemy hit. This Ability is treated as an Attack.

ability.name: Bouncing Bomb
ability.description: [Champion] throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.

ability.name: Time Bomb
ability.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.

ability.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
ability.description: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. While asleep, the target's Magic Resist is reduced. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.

ability.name: Rampant Growth
ability.description: [Champion] plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for [Champion]. [Champion] can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
